title: FS: Hartsel "BLUE FACED" color shift/printer's note?
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: FS: Hartsel "BLUE FACED" color shift/printer's note?
posts.post_content:
A very nice factory cut "color shift" showing a very Dramatic BLUE FACED appearance of Hartsel.........

not many are shifted this much.....


There was a thread about this card.(please search forum:o).....Steve B had thoughts of the markings on the front being possible printers notes written on the front to identify a bad registration to adjust the plate, but this is not confirmed.....

notice the bottom portion of the green is NOT shifted like the rest of the card....this is a very unique card
